thread.title: Philips net profit rises, hitch in LED division sale
thread.title_full: Philips net profit rises, hitch in LED division sale - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Philips net profit rises, hitch in LED division sale
text:
AMSTERDAM (AP) - Lighting and healthcare giant Royal Philips NV says its third-quarter net profit soared to 324 million euros ($357 million) from a loss of 103 million euros in the same quarter last year, when it took a 366 million-euro charge after losing a patent lawsuit.
Sales rose to 5.84 billion euros from 5.2 billion.
Philips also announced Monday that there is a hitch in the sale of an 80.1-percent stake in its LED components and automotive lighting division to a consortium led by investment fund GO Scale Capital.
The deal, worth up to $2.9 billion, was expected to be completed in the third quarter, but Philips says that the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States has "expressed certain unforeseen concerns" about the sale.
